name: Nimbleform Singer

features.Deadly Speed: At the start of each scene, if the nimbleform isn't surprised, they can take a fast turn before any other character (this doesn't cout as their turn this round).
features.Keen Senses: The nimbleform can spend 1 focus to gain an advantage on a Perception test (no action required).

action.name: Strike: Mace
action.description: Attack +5, reach 5 ft., one target. Graze: 3 (1d6) impact damage. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) impact damage.

action.name: Strike: Shorbow
action.description: Attack +5, range 80/320 ft., one target. Graze: 3 (1d6) impact damage. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) impact damage.

bi_action.name: Chosen Target (Costs 2 Focus)
bi_action.description: The nimbleform chooses an enemy then can sense within 120ft. For 1 hour, when the nimbleform hits their chosen enemy with a weapon attack, they deal an extra 3 (1d6) damage. In addition, the nimbleform gains an advantage on Survival tests to track that enemy.

tactics: Experts at tracking and surveying an area with Chosen Target.
